game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In search of a mysterious artifact lost for centuries, venture into treacherous ruins filled with secrets and dangers. Uncover the artifact's location and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a legendary potion

task.description: Make your way past the guards and enter the heart of the ruins.

location.name: Ruins of Eldorath
location.description: A desolate area filled with the remnants of an ancient civilization.
